snippet: The attacker, who killed himself, had been angry that his daughter had been barred from registering because she had not completed homework.
abstract: Police in Hubei Province, China, say Chen Yanfu stabbed to death three students and a teacher and wounded five other students before jumping to his death.
lead_paragraph: The attacker, who killed himself, had been angry that his daughter had been barred from registering because she had not completed homework.

headline.main: Parent Stabs to Death 3 Students and Teacher at School in China
headline.print_headline: China: Parent Kills 3 Students and Teacher at a School
